torch.name: Torch
torch.description: A rudimentary torch made from wood and oil soaked cloth.

mailbox.name: Mailbox
mailbox.description: You see a small open mailbox, there is a leaflet inside.

dagger.name: Dagger
dagger.description: A small pocket knife with an ivory handle. The blade is very sharp.

long-sword.name: Long-sword
long-sword.description: A one handed sword. While sharp, there is nothing special about it.

backpack.name: Backpack
backpack.description: A small backpack for carrying your items.
